comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Bombs recovered in case of Italian anarchist bombers who plotted to blow up St. Patrick's Cathedral on March 2, 1915: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A00E6DB1238E633A...

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Owen Eagan (1957-1920) was the New York Fire Department's bomb expert in the 1910s; he died (from natural causes) at work, age 63.

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks pennylrichardsca, we'll add his first name to the record. According to one article I found, he worked for the Fire Department's Bureau of Combustibles.
